Radish Boy: Oh thank you so much, Radish Boy! You're my hero!
By the way, are you still up to sneaking out at night?
Of course! I won't ever break my promise with my friends.
Mushroom Girl: He he, I just to be sure of that! Alright, I'll head to the village exit now. Why don't you visit Carrot Boy's house to check whether he's ready?
Radish Boy: Sure thing! Carrot Boy's house is nearby. I just have to head up and turn right to reach his home.
